comment.author: 91294996@N04
comment._content: Do you have an ID on the pilot? I believe it was my father, Richard Hopkins. He flew the Gizmo from 1956 to about 1960.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/91294996@N04] Sorry, there is no ID on the pilot.  On the back is written "1954" in pencil.  However, that may just be the year which the Gizmo was introduced, not the year the picture was taken.  If you email me at arenga@sdasm.org I can send you a hi res copy of the image, and you might be able to tell if it is your father.
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
